content.text: Match ends, Girona 0, Almería 1.
Second Half ends, Girona 0, Almería 1.
Esteban (Almería) is shown the yellow card.
Foul by Juanlu Hens (Girona).
Carlos Calvo (Almería) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  Girona. Conceded by Christian Fernández.
Attempt missed. Carlos Calvo (Almería) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Jonathan with a cross following a fast break.
Luso (Girona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Mejía (Almería).
Corner,  Girona. Conceded by Christian Fernández.
Attempt missed. Carlos Calvo (Almería) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Iago Falque.
Substitution, Girona. Ion Vélez replaces Felipe.
Corner,  Almería. Conceded by Isaac Becerra.
Attempt saved. Aleix Vidal (Almería) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Jonathan.
Substitution, Almería. Jonathan replaces Charles.
Attempt missed. Javier Acuña (Girona) header from the left side of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Luso with a cross.

Corner,  Almería. Conceded by Isaac Becerra.

Corner,  Girona. Conceded by Christian Fernández.
Penalty saved! Felipe (Girona) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  left footed shot saved  in the centre of the goal.

Foul by Charles (Almería).
